l10n.label: Translatable (l10n)?
l10n.description: L10n properties (defaults to false) allow the value to be localized / translatable. In storage, a field will be create for each active languages.

multiple.label: Multiple?
multiple.description: Multiple properties (default to false) can hold an array of values, instead of just a single value.

hidden.label: Hidden?
hidden.description: Hidden properties (default to false) should be active but hidden from any UI.

unique.label: Unique?
unique.description: Unique properties (default to false) can not have two of the same value in the same storage / database.

storable.label: Storable?
storable.description: Storable properties (default to true) should have a space in the database to be stored. Non-storable properties (if set to false)

active.label: Active?
active.description: Only active properties (default to true) should be taken into consideration. Inactive properties should not be used anywhere.
